subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Front-runners may not win the race, but Mainz and Valencia, the pacesetters in Germany and Spain and each operating on a shoestring, do not look like teams that will quietly fade away.
snippet: Front-runners may not win the race, but Mainz and Valencia, the pacesetters in Germany and Spain and each operating on a shoestring, do not look like teams that will quietly fade away.
